data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio do Dragao have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 2, Antonio Nobre signals a Porto throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Portimonense.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portimonense's half?
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Porto in the half of Portimonense.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Antonio Nobre awards Portimonense a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Porto.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 10, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Porto's Otavio misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
In the minute 12, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Porto.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 14, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! Beto heads Portimonense into a 0-1 lead.
Fahd Moufi instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 15, Portimonense needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 19, Porto have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Porto.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
Throw-in for Porto close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 27, Porto's Otavio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 29, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
In the minute 31, Antonio Nobre signals a Porto throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 32, Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Mateus Uribe with Mehdi Taremi. This is the first substitution made today by Sergio Conceicao.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 34, Porto are coming forward and Luis Diaz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio do Dragao.
Free kick Portimonense.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Attention is being given to Portimonenseâ€™s Lucas and play has been suspended briefly.
Lucas is back on the pitch.
In the minute 40, Porto have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Antonio Nobre awards Porto a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Porto.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Porto in their own half.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Porto.
At Estadio do Dragao the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Porto's Sergio Oliveira breaks free at Estadio do Dragao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Porto's Moussa Marega gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Portimonense defender.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Goal! Chancel Mbemba (Porto) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 45, Sergio Oliveira with an assist there.
The second half has started at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 46, Porto push forward at Estadio do Dragao and Otavio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Portimonense defence.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
In the minute 46, Goal! Porto have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Mehdi Taremi.
That's a fine assist from Sergio Oliveira.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
In the minute 48, Porto to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Porto.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Portimonense.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 53, Antonio Nobre signals a Porto throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Antonio Nobre awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Free kick Porto.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Porto in the half of Portimonense.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Sergio Oliveira (Porto) has received a yellow card from Antonio Nobre.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto to check on Lucas Fernandes, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 57, Lucas Fernandes for Portimonense is back on the field again.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lucas Fernandes.
Free kick in a good position for Porto!
In the minute 60, It seems as if Lucas Fernandes is unable to continue. Fernando Medeiros replaces him for the away team.
Corner awarded to Porto.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Estadio do Dragao, Jesus Corona has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 64, Mauricio Antonio is booked for the away team.
In Porto Porto attack through Luis Diaz. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio do Dragao.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Porto.
Fali Cande is on a sub for Mauricio Antonio for Portimonense.
In the minute 68, Paulo Sergio is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Dragao with Welinton Junior replacing Fahd Moufi.
Marko Grujic is replacing Luis Diaz for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Antonio Nobre signals a throw-in for Portimonense, close to Porto's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
In the minute 72, Throw-in high up the field for Portimonense in Porto.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Chancel Mbemba for Porto has been booked by Antonio Nobre and receives a first yellow card.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 75, Dener (Portimonense) has received a first yellow card.
Portimonense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Porto.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Portimonense make their fourth substitution with Julio Cesar replacing Anderson de Oliveira da Silva.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Sergio Oliveira gets his shot on target but fails to score for Porto.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 79, Porto to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Porto advance rapidly upfield but Antonio Nobre blows for offside.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Porto.
In the minute 81, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Porto have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Antonio Nobre signals a Porto throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Porto's Malang Sarr attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Antonio Nobre awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Sergio Oliveira puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-1.
In the minute 89, Great play from Jesus Corona to set up the goal.
Free kick Porto.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Portimonense.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Porto to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portimonense's half?
Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
Portimonense's Julio Cesar has been booked in Porto.
Joao Mario is replacing Wilson Manafa for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Sergio Conceicao (Porto) is making a fourth substitution, with Shoya Nakajima replacing Moussa Marega.
Sergio Conceicao (Porto) is making a fifth substitution, with Romario Baro replacing Otavio.
